CustomField.formula: IF ( No_Bundle_Savings__c = true, 0, IF ( Category__c = "Product" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 1, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 2, 350, 3, 500, 4, 500, 0), IF ( Category__c = "Product" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 2, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 3, 233.33 * Quantity , 4, 350 * Quantity, 5, 440 * Quantity, 6, 1000, 0), IF ( Category__c = "Product" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 3, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 6, 2100/3, 9, 4500/3, 0), IF ( Product_Code__c = "20YPP" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 1, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 2, 300, 3, 1000, 4, 1000, 0), IF ( Product_Code__c = "20YPP" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 2, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 3, 300, 4, 600, 5, 1300, 6, 2000, 0), IF ( Product_Code__c = "20YPP" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 3, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 6, 900, 9, 3000, 0), IF ( Product_Code__c = "ASP" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 1, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 2, 25, 3, 75, 0), IF ( Product_Code__c = "ASP" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 2, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 3, 25, 4, 50, 5, 100, 6, 150, 0), IF ( Product_Code__c = "ASP" && Opportunity.Numeric_Births__c = 2, CASE ( Opportunity.Number_of_Products__c , 6, 75, 9, 225, 0), 0))))))))))
CustomField.label: ZDeprecateBundle Savings OLD
